      • delete

        public void delete(Hotel h)
        Description copied from class: AbstractFabric
        This method deletes an item from the Database and removes it from its internal buffer. It uses PreparedStatement and generates the query automatically.
        Overrides:
        delete in class AbstractFabric<Hotel>
        Parameters:
        h - The DatabaseItem to delete.

      • createHotel

        public Hotel createHotel(City c,
                java.lang.String name,
                int reservationDayNumber)
        This method creates a Hotel.
        Parameters:
        c - The City of the Hotel.
        name - The name of the Hotel.
        reservationDayNumber - The number of days of the period before the Reservation in which you can't cancel it.
        Returns:
        The new Customer.
